sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: STOURBRIDGE, or Sturbich, the name of a field near Cambridge, noted for its famous fair kept annually on the 7th of September, and which continues for a fortnight. The commodities are, horſes, hops, iron, wool, leather, cheeſe, &c. This place is alſo noted for an excellent ſpecies of clay capable of resisting an intenſe heat. It is uſed in making pots for glaſs-houſes, fire-bricks, &c. and is ſold at an high price.
